EU reaches provisional deal to grant Ukraine tariff-free access to its markets, Belgian presidency saysThe European Union has reached a provisional agreement on granting Ukrainian food producers tariff-free access to its markets until June 2025, the Belgian EU presidency said on social media platform X on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:43:55 GMT BPSLAFULMZIHFFZSB3CKZYIP3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-reaches-provisional-deal-grant-ukraine-tariff-free-access-its-markets-belgian-2024-03-20/Reuters世界欧洲
New Zealand government to ban disposable e-cigarettesThe New Zealand government said on Wednesday it will ban the sale of disposable e-cigarettes, increase fines on retailers that sell to those younger than 18 years old and better regulate retailers. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:40:33 GMT UPUTYRL4LBPYXBKLCEIHKJW7RU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-zealand-government-ban-disposable-e-香烟-2024-03-20/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
China foreign minister says China, Australia economies 'highly complementary'The economies of China and Australia are "highly complementary" and have great potential, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said during a meeting with his Australian counterpart, according to a statement released by his ministry on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:18:34 GMT RGRP3NYKOBPFJC6NCSPAJQ3YQA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-foreign-minister-says-china-australia-economies-highly-complementary-2024-03-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
US gets 'mixed signals' from Niger on future of US troops, US general saysThe United States has received "mixed signals" from Niger following the ruling junta's weekend announcement that it had revoked an accord allowing U.S. troops to operate in the West African country, the top U.S. general said on Tuesday. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:13:28 GMT KTB4D2FK7ZM2JJZYGDEQSX6HEM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-gets-mixed-signals-niger-future-us-troops-us-general-says-2024-03-20/Reuters世界
Relocating UK asylum seekers from hotels will not save money, watchdog saysThe British government's decision to reduce the use of hotels to house asylum seekers by moving them to sites such as military bases will end up costing taxpayers more money, parliament's spending watchdog said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:12:48 GMT 6GP67VNMEJIP3PKROE67STIPSA https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/re located-uk-asylum-seekers-hotels-will-not-save-money-watchdog-says-2024-03-20/Andrew Macaskill世界英国
Gloomy youth pull US and western Europe down global happiness rankingRising unhappiness among younger people has caused the United States and some large western European countries to fall down a global wellbeing index, while Nordic nations retain their grip on the top spots. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:10:44 GMT PDDM5SWZ2ZJETMKMIL653YVVWI https://www.reuters.com/lifestyle/gloomy-youth-pull-us-western-europe-down-global-happiness-ranking-2024-03-20/David Milliken生活方式
Doctors who visited Gaza speak of 'atrocities,' collapsing healthcareThe healthcare system in Gaza has essentially collapsed, Western doctors who visited the Palestinian enclave in recent months told an event at the United Nations on Monday, speaking of "appalling atrocities" from Israel's offensive. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:09:07 GMT MFKXNATCW5KZ5DZHV6F5QLPYVM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/doctors-who-visited-gaza-speak-atrocities-collapsing-healthcare-2024-03-20/Josie Kao世界中东
UK to introduce bill to phase out smoking among young peopleThe British government will introduce a bill in parliament on Wednesday to fulfill its promise to phase out smoking among young people by banning tobacco sales for future generations. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:06:36 GMT XJRNFELLW5NHHJ6VK3YWHLW3FM https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-introduce-bill-phase-out-smoking-among-young-people-2024-03-20/Reuters世界英国
UK says 2,000-tonne food aid package has entered GazaMore than 2,000 tonnes of British food aid has crossed into Gaza via Jordan and is being distributed by the United Nations World Food Programme (WFP) to families in need, Britain's foreign ministry said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 00:04:09 GMT KOJ3YJVMCZN35A2EXFQ4LPVUKA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uk-says-2000-tonne-food-aid-package-has-entered-gaza-2024-03-20/Reuters世界中东
UN official protesting Gaza conflict alleges assault by security at headquartersA senior United Nations official who has been on a hunger strike in support of child victims of the Israel-Hamas conflict alleges he was assaulted by the organisation's security at its New York headquarters, an account the global body disputes. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 23:49:32 GMT WEM4BF23YFPENOEJU5UA5QLSWU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/un-official-protesting-gaza-conflict-alleges-assault-by-security-headquarters-2024-03-19/Emma Farge世界美国
Trump says he would take 'appropriate action' over Prince Harry visa questionFormer U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said if Prince Harry lied on his visa application about drug-taking Trump would seek to take "appropriate action" if he won November's presidential election, declining to rule out Harry leaving the United States. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:37:34 GMT ST3ZL62QVBJMVINNVTD56LYRUI https://www.reuters.com/world/trump-says-he-would-take-property-action-over-prince-harry-visa-question-2024-03-19/Kanishka Singh世界
